actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the retirement of employees after 30 years of service.

summary.text: Entitles Federal employees who have completed 30 years of services to an annuity, regardless of age.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the retirement of employees after 30 years of service.
